title: Yuru Yuri Nachuyachumi!
alternative_title: ゆるゆり なちゅやちゅみ！
description: Based on a manga series written and illustrated by Namori, serialised in Comic Yuri Hime S from June 12, 2008, later in Comic Yuri Hime in September 2010.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shoujo Ai>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
